name: That Time I Got Shot With A Guillotine Gun, And Lived To Tell The Tale
name_original: That Time I Got Shot With A Guillotine Gun, And Lived To Tell The Tale
description:
In a post Marine La Pen election, France, Germany, and Japan ally to take over the United States. Over the following 110 years, English is gradually replaced with Nihoncaise, a hybrid of French and Japanese.

Split between 2019 and 2129, an executioner's daughter reject her familial profession, as she falls in love with a patricidal murderess; a cyberpunk girl accidentally breaks a virtual reality game, that has once been a military simulation experiment during the two modern civil wars that split the United States into separate nations.
